name: Bifrost Spire
storyline:
On Earth, Vikings were great warriors that fight to prove their valor into Valhalla. True to their ancestors, the new Vikings became obsessed with intergalactic conquest, to prove to the gods their might.
After many millennia, their thirst for conquest was quenched as their conquered the only civilization left on Midgard standing up.Thus Odin built the Bifrost Spire, called upon the Vikings and declared that whoever got to the top of the spire would become a God of Valhalla.
Odin’s announcement lit a fire inside the new Vikings like never before, and the mightiest of warriors all rushed to climb the Bifrost Spire praising Odin.
summary:
Bifrost Spire is a Twin-Stick Shooter Bullet-Hell where you play as a Viking seeking to climb the Spire and become a God of Valhalla.

Play with up to four players in different game modes, working together and competing against each other for power and wealth. Use dozens of weapons and abilities to unleash mayhem on your enemies (and friends) while exploring procedurally generated dungeons, where risk means reward.
